reviews.text: Single platform, small shelter, no ticket sales, request stop, digital train display.  Signal clearly to driver that you wish to catch the train.  Tickets can be bought on board.  To leave the train at this stop, ensure conductor is aware that you wish to leave the train here.  When standing on the platform facing the track, trains approaching from the right are going toward Tenby / Pembroke Dock and trains approaching from the left are going toward Whitland / Carmarthen.
